trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for controls that implement the methods of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para controles que implementam os métodos da classe abstrata <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> can be used with other control types that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> pode ser usado com outros tipos de controle que implementam o <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> functions similarly to its base class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner> funções da mesma forma que sua classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates the child controls of this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Cria os controles filho deste controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.CreateChildControls%2A> method is used to recreate the child controls in the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.CreateChildControls%2A> método é usado para recriar os controles filho no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: It ensures that the control collection is created before creating the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Isso garante que a coleção de controle é criada antes de criar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O HTML usado para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the overloads available for this method see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as sobrecargas disponíveis para esse método, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: In this overridden method, the base implementation always creates the child controls on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Neste método substituído, a implementação base sempre cria os controles filho para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, which is the control associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />, que é o controle associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com o objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> to initialize the component for design.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.Initialize%2A> para inicializar o componente de design.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation will throw an exception if the associated control does not implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base lançará uma exceção se o controle associado não implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface.
